title: Game freeze after unplugging headphones
body: Since I can't create a discussion as lvl 5, I'm just gonna say it here. If anyone else has had their game freeze after unplugging a headphone, please tell me how to fix this. I have already played 30 games to get rid of my leaver buster . {{item:3151}}

replies.body: You might need to update the drivers that those headphones are using. If they aren't completely up to date it might be causing some hiccups with your system which then causes the crash.
